recipeFeature: Instantly tailor-made recipes to suit user preferences and dietary requirements, ensuring a limitless array of personalized meal options at your fingertips.
goalsFeature: Enjoy customized dishes perfectly calibrated to your unique dietary preferences, including macronutrient balance, calorie targets, cooking duration, and dietary restrictions. Experience culinary delight while staying in sync with your health goals effortlessly.
aiFeature: Transform your meal snapshots into detailed macronutrient and calorie estimates with our custom AI assistant. Experience hassle-free dietary tracking by simply taking a picture of your food.
restaurantFeature: Easily upload restaurant menus in PDF, and let our personalized assistant choose the best options to match your calorie and macronutrient targets, or input your restaurant preferences and dietary needs for optimal choices on the go.
